overview: If you think a cold beer is refreshing after sex, how about watching a thirsty butt drink some in during sex! That's just one cool scene from this stripped down to basics rump romp. From sex on antique stairs to a couple of studs in a tub, this refreshing, all bareback fuck-fest proves that there's nothing more satisfying than sucking some foam off a good head. Bottoms up!
title: Bareback
